job.title: Software Engineer (New Grad 2021)
job.description: ltstronggtltugtabout the positionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltstronggtrev engineersltstronggt are expected to do more than just produce great code they are expected to become experts on the problems facing our workers and customers produce great ideas and shape the future of our product at rev you wont only help us execute on our current businesses but you will play an integral role in impacting the direction of the remote labor market on a global scaleltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtwe are looking for exceptional full stack engineers that have recently graduated to join our growth stage startupltstronggt you can expect to make an impact from day one contributing to our web and mobile apps and pushing code to production on a weekly basis you will work alongside a group of smart pragmatic and passionate developersltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtyou willltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt use cuttingedge frontend technologies to build tools used by our revvers everyday ltligtltligt build fully tested features for our web or mobile applications ltligtltligt drive the definition of new features and product enhancements ltligtltligt help write the next generation of our restful apis ltligtltligt design scalable systems that can keep up with our rapidly growing user base ltligtltligt build great user experiences ltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtplease apply if youltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt fullstack web ltligtltulgtltligt have experience with a modern mvc framework such as asp net mvc ruby on rails nodejs ltligtltligt enjoy building frontends with frameworks like bootstrap backbone reactjs angularjs ltligtltulgtltligt mobile ltligtltulgtltligt have experience with developing native ios applications ltligtltligt enjoy building out beautiful mobile user interfaces ltligtltulgtltligt want to design and develop full features from start to finish ltligtltligt instinctively write tests in parallel with your code ltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtlife at revltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtrev is a profitable growthstage startup that specializes in meeting the speechtotext needs of hundreds of thousands of customers annually through its unmatched combination of the worlds most accurate speech ai and the worlds largest community of freelancers working sidebysideltbrgtltbrgtrevs suite of products includes transcription captioning subtitling as well as a livecaptioning app for zoom video conferencing rev also boasts seamless integrations with youtube and vimeo as well as custom apis for enterprise clients who need novel speechtotext solutionsltbrgtltbrgtfounded in by five mit alumni rev has raised millions of dollars in venture capital from top silicon valley vcs and experienced exceptionally rapid growth both internally and externally rev was recently named by forbes as one of americas most promising artificial intelligence companies and is a destination for the worlds foremost engineers and speech scientistsltbrgtltbrgtour promise is to create great work from home jobs powered by ai our vision is to transcend all barriers of communication joining rev means joining a team of smart passionate and friendly people with different backgrounds shared ideas and similar goals oh and tons of perksltbrgtltulgtltligtget paid be competitively compensated by a wellfunded startup enjoy full benefits options and a k ltligtltligtdesk budget ampamp office equipment rev will provide you with a new laptop you will also have a budget to outfit your workspace ltligtltligtmake a difference be measured by your impact not your effort help create real jobs for real people ltligtltligtwork where you want for most roles be free to stay at home come to the office or work from a coffee shop ltligtltligthave fun plan and participate in events like field day baseball games ski trips and happy hours ltligtltligtstretch yourself learn new skills talk to customers drive product improvements or learn to design we will push you to your limitsltbrgtltligtltulgtwe encourage and celebrate different perspectives regardless of gender gender identity or expression age race origin religion caregiver status disability ethnicity veteran status or sexual orientation multiple points of view fuel our innovation and connect us closer to revvers our customers and each otherltbrgtltbrgtrev is an equal opportunity employer that does not discriminate on the basis of actual or perceived race color creed religion national origin ancestry citizenship status age sex or gender including pregnancy childbirth and pregnancyrelated conditions gender identity or expression including transgender status sexual orientation marital status military service and veteran status physical or mental disability genetic information or any other characteristic protected by applicable federal state or local laws and ordinances revcom s management team is dedicated to this policy with respect to recruitment hiring placement promotion transfer training compensation benefits employee activities access to facilities and programs and general treatment during employmentltbrgtltulgtltligtwe are interested in every qualified candidate who is eligible to work in the united statesltbrgtltligtltulgtif you are based in california we encourage you to read this important information about our
